name: Electroid
tagline: Electroid: Electrum for Android - Native Edition
body:
### Welcome to the project page for Electroid
This is the placeholder location for Electroid when publicly released, however some UI design documents shall be published here for your viewing pleasure.

See [Pencil Design](design/) for the latest released partial designs done using [Pencil](http://pencil.evolus.vn) and the other remaining older designs at the [Fluid UI Preview](https://www.fluidui.com/editor/live/preview/p_RGxX55xwfpbksXAH1MhUs2kNa5KqCwgx.1375930514619).

### Authors and Contributors
Thomas Harning Jr. (@harningt) is the primary contributor to this project, however the 'base' project that this is based on is http://electrum.org by @spesmilo

### Further Information
More information currently published to the blog at http://e4a-ne.blogspot.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
